category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEActivityCustomTimeProperties
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of customer-defined properties of the CfgActivityLine class that are treated as times in the activity tree of Activities and Time views. The values of these properties are displayed in the time units selected in the Manufacturing section of the Options dialog box. Valid Values: One or more strings in a list. Each string must be a valid customer-defined property.
